title: Get the Surface Laptop 4 with a Ryzen 7 CPU for $211 off today
content:
The Surface Laptop 4 is Microsoft’s most recent traditional laptop, without the fancy 2-in-1 abilities of the Surface Book or the tablet form factor of the Surface Pro. It’s available in many different hardware configurations, but right now the Ryzen 7 version with 8GB RAM and 512GB RAM is on sale for as low as

The post Get the Surface Laptop 4 with a Ryzen 7 CPU for $211 off today appeared first on xda-developers.
description: This deal on the Ryzen 16-inch Surface Laptop 4 drops the price to $1,289 at Amazon or $1,300 over at Best Buy.
